title: #306:  Game of Calzones
description:
Grab your stolen pizza plate: we're back with a brand new episode of "Watch What Crappens!" We're talking RHONY, we're talking Below Deck: Med, we're talking eating disorders, we're talking fibroids, we're talking yachties, and we're talking calzones! Come listen!

00:07:18 - Crappens Mailbag
00:23:34 - CLEAR THE FLEMM
00:34:14 - Real Housewives of New York City
01:42:09 - Below Deck: Med
